meanings.definition: A person who writes or maintains a weblog.
meanings.sent1: Many webloggers share their thoughts online.
meanings.sent2: I follow a few webloggers who post interesting content.
meanings.sent3: The group of webloggers had a friendly competition to see who could write the most blog posts in a week.
meanings.sent4: In the world of online content, webloggers are the modern storytellers.
meanings.sent5: The community of webloggers is diverse and creative.

meanings.definition: The act of writing or maintaining a weblog.
meanings.sent1: Webloggers spend time crafting their blog posts.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the process of webloggers sharing their experiences through their blogs.
meanings.sent3: The art of being a successful weblogger involves engaging with your audience.
meanings.sent4: The impact of webloggers on the digital landscape is significant.
meanings.sent5: Webloggers play a crucial role in shaping online conversations.
